name: Retro Runner (neelkoos)
description:
3D - Tunnel runner game with the ‘80s, synth-wave, retro aesthetics
It's a prototype, my plans to add different color styles and obstacles, consumable items and permanent upgrades, ...

Tell me what you think, do you like it?

CONTROLS:
A - left
D - right
SPACE - boost

KNOWN ISSUES:

  • sadly the WebGL fmod not support the negative pitch, so the cool rewind effect is not working properly in browser.
  • mobile controls buggy sometimes
  • some edge cases are not handled
